pullRequest.title: Add Snapshot trigger on aggregate load time
pullRequest.bodyText: Added an AbstractSnapshotTrigger to make implementing a custom SnapshotTrigger easier. Added a AggregateLoadTimeSnapShotTriggerDefinition.

commit.message: Add Snapshotting on aggregate load time
Abstract methods need to be protected in order to be overwritten

nodes.bodyText: I'd call this method just reset.

Is this intended to be package-private? Could we make it private perhaps?
I think this method should have some javadoc, however boring setters are :-)
The @return value should be specified for this piece of javadoc.

+ * This number can exceed in two distinct scenarios: + *

    + *
  1. When initializing / event sourcing the aggregate in question.
    2. + *
  2. When new events are being applied by the aggregate.
